Suhendra Hadikuntono : Sambut Baik Iwan Bule sebagai Ketua Umum dan KPSN Akan Terus Awasi PSSI
03 Nov 2019, 20:08 by Adi Wiyono


Suhendra Hadikuntono : Sambut Baik Iwan Bule sebagai Ketua Umum dan KPSN Akan Terus Awasi PSSI

KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Komite Perubahan Sepakbola Nasional (KPSN), Suhendra Hadikuntono menegaskan pihaknya akan terus mengawasi kinerja PSSI yang kini dipimpin Ketua Umum Komjen Pol Mochamad Iriawan yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule.
KPSN ingin memastikan bahwa Iwan Bule bersama para anggota Komite Eksekutif PSSI masa bakti 2019-2023 serta kepengurusan yang akan segera dibentuk on track dan tidak melanggar norma-norma dan statuta PSSI.
"Saya ucapkan selamat kepada Mas Iwan (Komjen Pol Mochamad Iriawan-red) atas terpilihnya sebagai Ketua Umum PSSI 2019-2023 di arena KLB PSSI. Kita dukung agar mereka fokus dalam bekerja untuk melakukan perubahan di tubuh PSSI dan melahirkan prestasi. Kita harapkan visi-misi yang sudah dicanangkan dapat dijalankan," kata Suhendra kepada wartawan di Jakarta, Minggu siang (3/11/2019).
"Sebagaimana tujuan awal pembentukannya, KPSN akan tetap berperan sebagai fungsi check and balance. Penyeimbang. KPSN yang menginisiasi pemberantasan mafia pengaturan skor di sepakbola Indonesia. Kami berhasil mempersangkakan 18 orang pelaku pengaturan skor. Belum pernah terjadi di dunia manapun. Nah, saya berharap KLB ini menjadi hasil yang manis, melahirkan pemimpin baru yang akan melanjutkan tata nilai filosopi yang sudah dibangun oleh KPSN. Itu harapan kita," tambahnya.
Pria kelahiran Kota Medan ini mengaku optimis Iwan Bule akan mampu membawa perubahan bagi PSSI khususnya dalam hal pemberantasan mafia bola yang telah terbukti merusak sepakbola Indonesia dan merugikan negara. "Sebagai profesional Mas Iwan tentu memiliki sasaran antara dan sasaran utama. Sasaran antaranya adalah membenahi tata kelola PSSI. Sedangkan sasaran utamanya kita tidak tahu. Tetapi mari kita positif thinking," papar Suhendra yang juga Ketua Umum Putra-putri Jawa Kelahiran Sumatera, Sulawesi dan Maluku (Pujakessuma) Nusantara.
Ditanyakan soal figur para anggota Komite Eksekutif PSSI yang terpilih pada KLB PSSI 2 November kemarin di Shangrilla, menurut Suhendra mereka memang mayoritas muka lama yang cenderung 'tidak diterima pasar'.
"Karena itu kalau boleh kasih masukkan, Mas Iwan sebaiknya melakukan reorganisasi internal di PSSI. Pak Iwan sebagai pemimpin harus mampu menertibkan pengurus-pengurus yang nakal terutama yang berkaitan dengan praktik pengaturan skor. Untuk memperkuat soliditas organisasi agar visi-misi Mas Iwan untuk memperbaiki tata kelola PSSI, pembinaan dan timnas dapat tercapai. Saya yakin Mas Iwan Bule juga akan melakukan pembersihan-pembersihan di dalam PSSI," tutup Suhendra.

Suhendra Hadikuntono: Welcomes Iwan Bule as Chairperson and KPSN Will Continue to Monitor PSSI
03 Nov 2019, 20:08 by Adi Wiyono


Suhendra Hadikuntono: Welcomes Iwan Bule as Chairperson and KPSN Will Continue to Monitor PSSI

KBRN, Jakarta: Chairman of the National Football Change Committee (KPSN), Suhendra Hadikuntono stressed that his party will continue to oversee the performance of PSSI which is now led by General Chairman of the National Police Commissioner General Mochamad Iriawan who is familiarly called Iwan Bule.
KPSN wants to ensure that Iwan Bule along with the members of the PSSI Executive Committee 2019-2023 service period and management that will soon be formed on track and does not violate the norms and statutes of PSSI.
"I congratulate Mas Iwan (National Police Commissioner Mochamad Iriawan-ed) for his election as Chairman of PSSI 2019-2023 in the PSSI KLB arena. We support them to focus on working to make changes in the body of PSSI and give birth to achievements. We hope that the vision- the mission that has been declared can be carried out, "Suhendra told reporters in Jakarta, Sunday afternoon (3/11/2019).
"As the initial goal of its formation, KPSN will continue to play a role as a check and balance function. Balancing. KPSN which initiated the eradication of the mafia fixing in Indonesian football. We succeeded in bringing together 18 players who set the score. Never happened in any world. Well, I hope KLB "This is a sweet result, giving birth to a new leader who will continue the philosophical values that have been built by KPSN. That's our hope," he added.
The man born in Medan City is optimistic that Iwan Bule will be able to bring change to PSSI, especially in terms of eradicating the football mafia which has proven to damage Indonesian football and harm the country. "As a professional, Mas Iwan certainly has a target between and the main target. The target of which is to improve PSSI governance. While the main target we do not know. But let's think positively," said Suhendra who is also Chairperson of Javanese Children Born in Sumatra, Sulawesi and Maluku (Pujakessuma) Nusantara.
Asked about the figures of the members of the PSSI Executive Committee who were elected at the November 2 PSSI KLB in Shangrilla, according to Suhendra they were indeed the majority of the old faces who tended to be 'unacceptable to the market'.
"Therefore, if I may give it to you, Mas Iwan should do an internal reorganization at PSSI. Pak Iwan as a leader must be able to curb naughty officials, especially those related to the practice of scoring. To strengthen organizational solidity so that Mas Iwan's vision and mission to improve governance "PSSI management, coaching and national team can be achieved. I am sure that Mas Iwan Bule will also clean up the PSSI," concluded Suhendra.
